column4: adding an "-s" option performs ordering simulation, you might try that out.
usually even doing an "apt-get" it'll ask before installing anything and you can see what'll be installed.
yes it'll do that, but before doing it i'd suggest to read this: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/InstallingKDE?highlight=%28kde%29
because as you see there's a few different choices for installing KDE.
